page.title: 11ROUNDWOOD PARK LONDON NW10
page.content: {The park was opened on 11th May 1895. It has landscaped gardens and a small aviary.It is not really a park for football.There is a small cafe,bowling club,and a putting green.In one corner of the park there is a play area for children and an open air theatre. Many events are held in the park during the year.Some held this year were{The Brent Show,Brent Carnival, {the London Irish Festival and the {annual Fireworks Display. This year's carnival was held in late June.There were processions,steel bands and national dances from many countries.There was also a fun-fair with many side-shows.{The Mayor of {Brent}and his entourage were there.The following week was the London Irish Festival, with representatives from each county. Dancing competitions were held and many local girls won prizes.
